titles.title: God Is Our Refuge and Strength

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Though the earth should change Though mountains should tremble and shake We will not fear For God is our refuge and strength{/lang-eng}
